siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Pageturner is a free community for readers and people building their reading habit. Reading in public and sharing your notes lets you discover interesting ideas and keeps you accountable.
blogPost.body: Pageturner is a free community for readers and people building their reading habit. Reading in public and sharing your notes lets you discover interesting ideas and keeps you accountable.
blogPost.title: Pageturner - Let's build a reading habit, together
blogPost.author: Bruce

localize.description: Pageturner是一个免费的社区，为读者和人们建立他们的阅读习惯。公开阅读和分享你的笔记，让你发现有趣的想法，并让你负责任。
localize.tagline: 让我们一起养成阅读的习惯吧

localize.description: Pageturner是一個免費的社區，爲讀者和人們建立他們的閱讀習慣。公開閱讀和分享你的筆記，讓你發現有趣的想法，並讓你負責任。
localize.tagline: 讓我們一起養成閱讀的習慣吧

previous.excerpt: VECA is our plug and play, prebuilt intent recognition system for post-sales eCommerce support. Trained on 10 million user queries, automate your conversations with just a click.
previous.title: VECA - Your eCommerce assistant

localize.description: VECA是我们即插即用、预建的意图识别系统，用于售后电商支持。训练了1000万用户的查询，只需点击一下就可以自动对话。
VECA是我們即插即用、預建的意圖識別系統，用於售後電商支持。訓練了1000萬用戶的查詢，只需點擊一下就可以自動對話。

next.excerpt: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.
next.title: Draftshot for Dribbble - Predict how popular your shot might be on Dribbble

localize.description: Draftshot是一款应用，它可以在你上传到Dribbble之前就预测你的镜头可能会有多受欢迎。无论是logo、网页设计还是插画，都不在话下。Draftshot使用机器学习来预测任何设计的受欢迎程度。
localize.tagline: 预测你的投篮在Dribbble上的受欢迎程度。

localize.description: Draftshot是一款應用，它可以在你上傳到Dribbble之前就預測你的鏡頭可能會有多受歡迎。無論是logo、網頁設計還是插畫，都不在話下。Draftshot使用機器學習來預測任何設計的受歡迎程度。
localize.tagline: 預測你的投籃在Dribbble上的受歡迎程度。
